Resources

Want to go further ? Here are some good resources to get you started with CSS3, HTML5, Responsive Design, Optimization, Best Practices, Feature Detections and Polyfils

CSS3
Great information on CSS3 usage
http://www.css3files.com
HTML5
Nice walkthrough of various new HTML5 features and how to use them
http://diveintohtml5.info
Many tutorials & resoures around HTML5
http://www.html5rocks.com
The HTML5 Microdata dictionary
http://schema.org
Polyfils
Extensive list of different types of polyfills
https://github.com/Modernizr/Modernizr/wiki/HTML5-Cross-browser-Polyfills
Feature Detections
One stop resource, tell you which browsers support what and from which version
http://caniuse.com
Great information on verious implementation quirks of various browsers
http://www.quirksmode.org
THE biggest feature detection list known to man
https://github.com/Modernizr/Modernizr/tree/master/feature-detects
Got some cool resource to share ?

-> Share it!
